mapper.insert: insert into deans(first_name, last_name, birthday, salary, addresses_id) values (#{arg0.firstName}, #{arg0.lastName}, #{arg0.birthday}, #{arg0.salary}, #{arg1})
mapper.update: update deans set first_name = #{arg0.firstName}, addresses_id = #{arg1} where id = #{arg0.id}
mapper.select: select d.first_name as dean_first_name, d.last_name as dean_last_name, a.city as address_city from deans d left join addresses a on a.id = d.addresses_id
